data.text: @WesElyMD I am invited to a wedding in June in Germany for a dear friend. I would be lying if I said I was not scared to go. CDC is waiting until Xmas time for next vaccine dose which implies after next month vaccine effectiveness starts to decrease below 50%. Long Covid looks horrific.
@WesElyMD Or hold your freaking wedding outdoors!!!
@WesElyMD Go with a plan ahead of time! Pack a pre-fab list of excuses. My own behavior shocked me just before Delta. It was soo good to see family at one wedding, that my mask just flew off my face.
@WesElyMD And we can expect outcomes (unvax v vax)to diverge even more significantly over disease course.
